sqlMap.select: SELECT lecture.lectureno, lecture.subject, lecture.poster, lecture.teacher, lecture.lecturetime FROM sol_lecture lecture join sol_category category ON lecture.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok = #gwamok# ORDER BY lecture.lectureno DESC
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM sol_lecture lecture join sol_category category ON lecture.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok=#gwamok#

SELECT category.categoryinfo FROM sol_lecture lecture JOIN sol_category category ON lecture.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok= #gwamok# GROUP BY lecture.categoryno
